id: TechRadarAmazon’s first official early Black Friday deals are here
paragraph:
By
Mackenzie Frazier
2018-11-16T13:36:07Z

Black Friday
 

Starting today through Black Friday, Amazon will be releasing thousands of new deals across every department.  Amazon's "Seven Days of Black Friday Deals" will include huge savings on electronics, kitchen appliances, toys and more.
If you've been waiting for discounts to drop on Amazon devices, then you're in luck. Starting today, you can save over $100 on device bundles, tablets, smart speakers and security cameras.
One deal that is sure to be popular this Black Friday is the Fire HD 10 Tablet. Amazon has listed the popular Fire Tablet for just $99.99. That's $50 off the original price and the lowest price we've seen on this device.Fire HD 10 Tablet with Alexa Hands-Free $149.99 $99.99 at AmazonThis top-rated tablet features a 1080p Full HD display and is 33% off starting today at Amazon.View DealWe'll be updating new deals daily to make sure you don't miss out on any savings, but make sure to take advantage of all these stellar sales today.
